程序包 net.minecraftforge.client.event

类 GuiScreenEvent.DrawScreenEvent.Post

  • java.lang.Object

  • 封闭类:
    GuiScreenEvent.DrawScreenEvent
    public static class GuiScreenEvent.DrawScreenEvent.Post
extends GuiScreenEvent.DrawScreenEvent
    This event fires just after GuiScreen.drawScreen(int, int, float) is called.
